alert.note: Alert for Clatsop; Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 9:02PM PST until December 29 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Luckiamute River near Suver affecting Polk and Benton Counties. Tualatin River near Dilley affecting Washington County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon... Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Nehalem River near Foss. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...Above 15.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low lying farm land and structures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM PST Wednesday the stage was near 15 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday and continue to subside. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning by 900 AM PST.
